# edgecenter_rmon_channel (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "edgecenter" {
  permanent_api_token = "251$d3361.............1b35f26d8"
}

resource "edgecenter_rmon_channel" "telegram_alerts" {
  receiver     = "telegram"
  token        = "123456:example-telegram-bot-token"
  channel_name = "rmon-alerts"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `channel_name` (String) The channel identifier.
- `receiver` (String) Receiver type used in API path. Only 'telegram', 'slack', 'pd', 'mm', 'email' are allowed.
- `token` (String) The token used for the channel.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
